plugin.name: PotPourri
plugin.title: PotPourri
plugin.desc: A collection of small features: change playlist track order of playlists, scheduled auto power-off of all players, set a player's power-on start volume... More information (incl. a more comprehensive feature list) on the GitHub page.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: ContextStats
plugin.title: Context Stats
plugin.desc: Display lists of tracks, albums or artists sorted by statistics from the context menus of artists, albums, genres, years and playlists. More information on the GitHub page.
plugin.creator: AF
